title: Account has been hacked pls help
body: So my account has been hacked they took over the account by changing the email address but not changing password so there was no way for me to know unless i looked into it pls help me rito.

replies.body:
54367

what do you do if the account recovery form won't let you submit it?  I tried several times yesterday and it will not let me submit it.

Broporo to the rescue! {{summoner:31}} 

We can still help you get your account back even if you can't login! Reach out to us through our [Account Recovery Form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416). We'll be able to get your account back in the right hands in your ticket.
